questions.question: কোন বানানটি ঠিক?
questions.explanation: কতিপয় শুদ্ধ বানান: অন্তঃসত্ত্বা, অত্যধিক, অশ্বত্থ, অগ্ন্যাশয়, অন্ত্যেষ্টিক্রিয়া, অগ্ন্যুৎপাত, ক্ষুণ্ণ, দুরূহ, কৌতূহল, ষাণ্মাসিক, স্বতঃস্ফূর্ত, দুরবস্থা, বিদ্বান, অভ্যুত্থান।

questions.question: পঞ্চবটী' কোন সমাস
questions.explanation: সমাহার (সমষ্টি) বা মিলন অর্থে সংখ্যাবাচক শব্দের সঙ্গে বিশেষ্য পদের যে সমাস হয়, তাকে দ্বিগু সমাস বলে। যেমন: পঞ্চ বটের সমাহার = পঞ্চবটী।

questions.question: 'আঠারো বছর বয়স' কবিতাটি কার রচনা?
questions.explanation: 'আঠারো বছর বয়স' কবিতাটি সুকান্ত ভট্টাচার্যের (১৯২৬- ১৯৪৭) 'ছাড়পত্র' (১৯৪৮) কাব্যগ্রন্থ হতে নেওয়া হয়েছে।

questions.question: কোন বাক্যটিতে কর্তৃকারকে 'এ' বিভক্তির উদাহরণ আছে?
questions.explanation: ক্রিয়াকে 'কে' বা 'কারা' দিয়ে প্রশ্ন করলে যে উত্তর পাওয়া তাই কর্তৃকারক। যেমন: মেয়েরা ফুল তোলে।

questions.question: পদ্মানদীর মাঝি' উপন্যাসের চরিত্র কুবের মাঝির বাড়ি কোন গ্রামে-
questions.explanation: পদ্মানদীর মাঝি' (১৯৩৬) উপন্যাসটি ১৯৩৪ সাল থেকে 'পূর্বাশা' পত্রিকায় ধারাবাহিকভাবে প্রকাশিত হতে থাকে। মানিক বন্দ্যোপাধ্যায় মূলত উপন্যাসটিতে পদ্মা তীরবর্তী কেতুপুর গ্রামের মানুষের প্রাত্যহিক জীবনের সংগ্রাম, হাসি-কান্না, জন্ম-মৃত্যু নিয়ে রচিত।

questions.question: 'যা পূর্বে দেখা যায়নি' এক কথায় কী হবে?
questions.explanation: কতিপয় এক কথায় প্রকাশ যা বহন করা হচ্ছে- নীয়মান, যার দুবার জন্ম হয়েছে- দ্বিজ, যা পূর্বে ছিল এখন নেই- ভূতপূর্ব, যা পূর্বে কখনো হয়নি- অভূতপূর্ব।

questions.question: উন্মনা' এর সন্ধিবিচ্ছেদ-
questions.explanation: ন্ কিংবা ম্ পরে থাকলে বর্গের প্রথম ধ্বনি সন্ধিতে পঞ্চম ধ্বনিতে পরিণত হয়। যেমন বাক্ + ময় = বাঙ্ময় অপ + ময় = অম্ময় চিৎ + ময় = চিন্ময় উৎ + মেষ = উন্মেষ পরাক্ + মুখ = পরাম্মুখ জীবৎ + মৃত = জীবনস্মৃত

questions.question: হে যীশু, ও হরি, হে আল্লা, আমার যবন হরিদাসকে ফিরিয়ে দে।' উদ্ধৃতিটি কোন গদ্যাংশের?
'ওঁচা' শব্দের অর্থ
questions.explanation: ওঁচা' শব্দের দ্বারা 'হেয়, নিকৃষ্ট' বোঝায়।

questions.question: 'চামার' শব্দটি-
questions.explanation: কয়েকটি তদ্ভব শব্দ: হাত, চাঁদ, চোখ, বিয়ে, দেওর, কাজ, ঘর।

questions.question: Choose the word that is most nearly opposite in meaning to the word "RIGOROUS"
questions.explanation: Rigorous কর্কশ, ভারী। Scabrous ছাল; Lax শিথিল, কোমল; Ponderous - ভারী, ধীর; Precarious - অনিশ্চিত, বিপজ্জনক।

questions.question: Choose the pair that best expresses the relationship similar to HEURISTIC: TEACH
questions.explanation: Heuristic: teach (আবিষ্করণী: শিক্ষা দেওয়া)। Parable: obfuscate (নীতিগল্প: হতবুদ্ধি করা)। Pedant: construct (তত্ত্বিয় শিক্ষায় জোর দেওয়া: নির্মাণ)। Performer: entertain ((অভিনয়কারী: বিনোদন)। Virus: prevent (জীবাণু বিশেষ: নিবারণ)।

questions.question: Choose the word that is most nearly similar in meaning to the word "IMPEL"
questions.explanation: Impel প্রণোদিত করা। Propel সম্মুখে চালিত করা; Menace - ভয়াবহ বিপদ; Jeopardize বিপদগ্রস্ত করা; Certify - সত্যয়ন, সাক্ষ্য।

questions.question: Choose the word that is most nearly similar in meaning to the word "RELUCTANT"
questions.explanation: Reluctant - অনিচ্ছুক, বিতৃষ্ণ। Loath অনিচ্ছুক Keen - ধারাল, তীক্ষ্ণ; Enthusiastic প্রবল আগ্রহ: Fake নকল।

questions.question: Choose the word that is most nearly similar in meaning to the word "FIASCO"
questions.explanation: Fiasco- ব্যর্থতা। Debacle - ছত্রভঙ্গ ও পরাজয় Protest - প্রতিবাদ; Artificial - কৃত্রিম; Untamed - বিরোধী।

questions.question: Nobody ____ you knows the truth.
questions.explanation: Nobody এর সাথে but বসে।

questions.question: Two and two- - four.
questions.explanation: Amount of time, money, distance সর্বদা singula verb গ্রহণ করে।

questions.question: Iron as well as gold ___ found in India.
questions.explanation: Subject + as well as/ along with, accompained by/ with + কোনো কিছু/ব্যক্তি, and not + Noun/Pronoun + Verb থাকলে ১ম অংশের sub অনুযায়ী verb হবে।

questions.question: Milton ____ one of the greatest poets that ___ ever lived.
questions.explanation: One of the এরপর noun/pronoun সবসময় plural হয় কিন্তু singular verb বসে। Relative pronoun এর পরের verb সবসময় তার আগের noun/pronoun অনুযায়ী বসে।

questions.question: He was born ____ small village ___ Rajshahi.
questions.explanation: নির্দিষ্ট স্থানের পূর্বে at বসে এবং বড় স্থানের পূর্বে in preposition বসে।

questions.question: The child has been missing ____ yesterday
questions.explanation: Present Perfect Tense এ since অথবা for ব্যবহৃত হয়। সময়ের পরিমাণ (Amount/period of time) = for। শুরুর সময় (beginning time) = since ।

questions.question: Just a moment! I've got the answer on the ___ of my tongue.
questions.explanation: Top উপরের স্থান; Tap মৃদু আঘাত; Tip অগ্রভাগ; Back - পশ্চাত।

questions.question: My captors were taking me to prison. Passive form of this sentence is:

options.label: ক
options.text: I was being taken to prison by my captors.

options.label: খ
options.text: I have been taken to prison by my captors.

options.label: গ
options.text: I was taken to prison by my captors.

options.label: ঘ
options.text: I had been taken to prison by my captors.

questions.option_a: I was being taken to prison by my captors.
questions.option_b: I have been taken to prison by my captors.
questions.option_c: I was taken to prison by my captors.
questions.option_d: I had been taken to prison by my captors.
questions.explanation: Passive voice এর নিয়ম অনুযায়ী B, C, D ভুল

questions.question: Choose the word that is most nearly similar in meaning to the word "CONDITIONAL"
questions.explanation: The word “CONDITIONAL” means something that depends on a condition . Among the options: ক) erratic → unpredictable ❌ খ) crystalline → clear, structured ❌ গ) unrestricted → without limits ❌ ঘ) dependent → matches the meaning ✅ ✅ Correct answer: ঘ) dependent

questions.question: Choose the word that is most nearly opposite in meaning to the "IRRELEVANT"
questions.explanation: Irrelevant অর্থ অপ্রাসঙ্গিক। Moot- তর্ক করা; Onerous- বোমা জাতীয়; Impertinent- বেয়াদব; Germane- প্রাসঙ্গিক।

questions.question: Although the stock market has experienced strong - in the past two years, there have been short periods in which the market has ____ suddenly.
questions.explanation: (a) Augmentation: steadied (বাড়ানো: দৃঢ়) (b) Growth: fallen (বৃদ্ধি: পড়ে যাওয়া) (c) Extension: stabilized (বৃদ্ধি, ব্যপ্তি: স্থায়িত্ব) (d) Development: increased (উন্নতি: বৃদ্ধি)

questions.question: A businessman must widen his horizons; a _____ attitude will get you nowhere in this age of global communications,
questions.explanation: Moderate- মাঝারি, মধ্যপন্থী; Scared stiff- স্থায়ী দুঃখঃ Narrow-minded- সংকীর্ণ মনের; Diversified- রূপান্তর করা।

questions.question: Which of the following sentence is CORRECT?

options.label: খ
options.text: It must have been her at the door.

options.label: ঘ
options.text: He didn't know that it was I who did it

questions.option_b: It must have been her at the door.
questions.option_d: He didn't know that it was I who did it
questions.explanation: (A) (b) হবে না, কারণ Be Verb এর পর Subjective Pronoun বসবে। (c) হবে না কারণ Preposition (from) এরপর Pronoun এর objective form বসে। শুধুমাত্র (d) তেই Clause marker Pronoun এর সঠিক ব্যবহার হয়েছে।

questions.question: Notwithstanding his hard work, he did not succeed. The compound form of this simple sentence is:

options.label: ক
options.text: Despite working hard, he did not succeed.

options.label: গ
options.text: Though he worked hard, he did not succeed.

options.label: ঘ
options.text: He worked hard, yet did not succeed.

questions.option_a: Despite working hard, he did not succeed.
questions.option_c: Though he worked hard, he did not succeed.
questions.option_d: He worked hard, yet did not succeed.
questions.explanation: And, or, but ছাড়াও yet অনেক ক্ষেত্রে conjunction হিসেবে ব্যবহৃত হয়ে compound sentence গঠন করতে পারে।

questions.question: He died in the village where he was born. The simple form of this complex sentence is:

options.label: খ
options.text: He died in his native village.

options.label: গ
options.text: He was born in a village and died in the same village

options.label: ঘ
options.text: He died in a village where his birth took place.

questions.option_b: He died in his native village.
questions.option_c: He was born in a village and died in the same village
questions.option_d: He died in a village where his birth took place.
questions.explanation: C হবে না কারণ and, but, or সাধারণত Compound sentence হয়। D হবে না কারণ এটি Complex sentence এ আছে জন্মভূমি বলতে সাধারণত native village কে বুঝায় তাই A ভুল।

questions.question: He is greater than I. Negative form of this affirmative sentence is:

options.label: ক
options.text: I am not as great as he

options.label: খ
options.text: He is not greater than I

options.label: গ
options.text: He is not so great as I

options.label: ঘ
options.text: I am not greater than he.

questions.option_a: I am not as great as he
questions.option_b: He is not greater than I
questions.option_c: He is not so great as I
questions.option_d: I am not greater than he.
questions.explanation: He is greater than I সে আমার চেয়ে মহৎ। Negative করলে হবে- I am not as great as he আমি তার মতো মহৎ নই।

questions.question: Children not only provide cheap labor, but they are also - as they do not complain about menial chores given to them or about harsh treatment meted out.
Pick up the INCORRECT sentence:

options.label: ক
options.text: Becon as well as Shakespeare were dead.

options.label: ঘ
options.text: This road is shorter than that

questions.option_a: Becon as well as Shakespeare were dead.
questions.option_d: This road is shorter than that
questions.explanation: Subject+ as well as/ along with/ accompained by/ with + কোনো কিছু/ব্যক্তি অথবা, and not Noun/Pronoun+Verb থাকলে ১ম অংশের sub অনুযায়ী verb হবে।

questions.question: The plane had been redesigned so many times before it reached the assembly line that its - conception was no longer -.
The author presumably believes that all businessmen are- for his main characters, whatever qualities they may lack, are virtual paragons of -.
Turn into the indirect form of speech: Socrates said, "Knowledge is power"

options.label: খ
options.text: Socrates said that knowledge is power.

options.label: গ
options.text: Socrates said that knowledge was power.

questions.option_b: Socrates said that knowledge is power.
questions.option_c: Socrates said that knowledge was power.

questions.question: OH, I'm sorry. I should't have said that. I guess I really put my ___ in my mouth.
questions.explanation: Foot, elbow ও knee কখনো মুখে রাখা সম্ভব নয়।

questions.question: Choose the pair that best expresses the relationship similar to BLUEPRINT: HOUSE
questions.explanation: Blueprint: House (নকশা, পরিকল্পনা: বাড়ি ঘর) এবং outline: essay (রূপরেখা, রচনা)।

questions.question: Choose the pair that best expresses the relationship similar to CONSPIRE: COLLABORATE
Turn into the indirect form of speech: The general said to the soldiers, "March on."

options.label: ক
options.text: The general commanded to be on march

options.label: খ
options.text: The general said to the soldiers to march on.

options.label: গ
options.text: The general commanded the soldiers to march on.

options.label: ঘ
options.text: The general said to the soldiers to be on march.

questions.option_a: The general commanded to be on march
questions.option_b: The general said to the soldiers to march on.
questions.option_c: The general commanded the soldiers to march on.
questions.option_d: The general said to the soldiers to be on march.
questions.explanation: Imperative sentence এর Indirect narration এ reporting verb কে অর্থানুযায়ী tell, ask, request, advice, order বা command প্রভৃতি verb এ পরিবর্তন করতে হয় এবং Imperative mood এর পরিবর্তে Indefinite mood 'to' ব্যবহৃত হয়।

questions.question: Pick up the INCORRECT sentence:

options.label: ক
options.text: Daniel and katie wish they were a ninja.

options.label: খ
options.text: Sarah, Farr and Jonas want to be pilots.

options.label: ঘ
options.text: After being rescued from the fire, Greg and John swore they would become firefighters

questions.option_a: Daniel and katie wish they were a ninja.
questions.option_b: Sarah, Farr and Jonas want to be pilots.
questions.option_d: After being rescued from the fire, Greg and John swore they would become firefighters
questions.explanation: এখানে Daniel and Katie হলো Plural Subject তাই a ninja, যা কিনা singular তা ভুল।

questions.question: Why waste time in reading trash? Assertive form of this interrogative sentence is:

options.label: ক
options.text: We should not waste time in reading trash.

options.label: খ
options.text: Do not waste time in reading trash.

options.label: গ
options.text: It is extremely foolish to waste time in reading trash.

options.label: ঘ
options.text: Reading trash is wastage of time

questions.option_a: We should not waste time in reading trash.
questions.option_b: Do not waste time in reading trash.
questions.option_c: It is extremely foolish to waste time in reading trash.
questions.option_d: Reading trash is wastage of time
questions.explanation: A এবং C হবে না কারণ গঠনগত ভুল। B হবে না কারণ এটি Imperative sentence এ আছে।

questions.question: I shall be obliged to go. Passive form of this sentence is:

options.label: ক
options.text: I shall be obliged by someone to go

options.label: গ
options.text: Circumstances will oblige me to go.

options.label: ঘ
options.text: Circumstances will be obliged by me to go.

questions.option_a: I shall be obliged by someone to go
questions.option_c: Circumstances will oblige me to go.
questions.option_d: Circumstances will be obliged by me to go.
questions.explanation: Voice এর নিয়ম অনুযায়ী শুধুমাত্র C-ই সঠিক আছে।

questions.question: Which of the following sentence is CORRECT?

options.label: ক
options.text: John is absent but few of the class is here.

options.label: খ
options.text: Everyone on the project have to come to the meeting.

options.label: গ
options.text: Either of those dresses is suitable for the party

options.label: ঘ
options.text: Neither of them are experts on the subject.

questions.option_a: John is absent but few of the class is here.
questions.option_b: Everyone on the project have to come to the meeting.
questions.option_c: Either of those dresses is suitable for the party
questions.option_d: Neither of them are experts on the subject.
questions.explanation: Every, either, neither এর পরের verb সর্বদা Singular হয়।

questions.question: Which of the following sentences is CORRECT?

options.label: ক
options.text: If anyone calls take their name.

options.label: গ
options.text: Those of us who care should write to our MP.

options.label: ঘ
options.text: Some of you will have to come in their own car.

questions.option_a: If anyone calls take their name.
questions.option_c: Those of us who care should write to our MP.
questions.option_d: Some of you will have to come in their own car.
questions.explanation: ভুল, কারণ Anyone এর Pronoun সবসময় Singular হয়। (B) ভুল, কারণ The food-এর verb অবশ্যই tastes হবে taste নয়। (B) ভুল, their own card হবে।

questions.question: Which word will appear first in the dictionary?
questions.explanation: Expenditure শব্দের অর্থ 'ব্যয়/ খরচ'।

questions.question: Which one is not a stock market index of Chittagong Stock Exchange?
What is the elaboration of "PRSP" in Bangladesh.
questions.explanation: Poverty Reduction Strategy Papers (PRSPs) are documents required by the International Monetary Fund (IMF) and World Bank before a country can be considered for debt relief within the Heavily Indebted Poor Countries (HIPC) intiative.

questions.question: Who wins the 2010 Nobel Prize in Peace?
questions.explanation: ২০২২ সালে শান্তিতে নোবেল পুরষ্কার লাভ করে এলিস বিয়ালিয়ৎস্থি (বেলারুশ), মেমোরিয়াল (রাশিয়া), সেন্টার ফর সিভিল লিবার্টিস (ইউক্রেন)।

questions.question: United Nations (UN) has awarded Bangladesh in 2010 for:

options.label: গ
options.text: reduction of corruption in public sector

questions.option_c: reduction of corruption in public sector
questions.explanation: United Nations (UN) has awarded Bangladesh in 2010 for reduction of child mortality rate ।

questions.question: Which one is the manufacturer of FIFA 2010 World Cup official ball?
questions.explanation: FIFA 2022 World Cup -এর বলের নাম Rihla আর এই বলের Manufacturer (প্রস্তুতকারক) Adidas।

questions.question: The largest coal mine reserve in Bangladesh is situated in:

z + 2 z = 2 z ; z 2 = ( ? ) z+\frac{2}{z}=2 z ; z^{2}=(?) z + z 2 ​ = 2 z ; z 2 = ( ?)
questions.explanation: z + 2 z = 2 z ⇒ z 2 + 2 z = 2 z ⇒ 2 z 2 = z 2 + 2 ⇒ 2 z 2 − z 2 = 2 ⇒ z 2 = 2 \begin{array}{l} \text {} z+\frac{2}{z}=2 z \\ \Rightarrow \frac{z^{2}+2}{z}=2 z \Rightarrow 2 z^{2}=z^{2}+2 \\ \Rightarrow 2 z^{2}-z^{2}=2 \Rightarrow z^{2}=2 \end{array} z + z 2 ​ = 2 z ⇒ z z 2 + 2 ​ = 2 z ⇒ 2 z 2 = z 2 + 2 ⇒ 2 z 2 − z 2 = 2 ⇒ z 2 = 2 ​

questions.question: Which of the following represents 10 % 10 \% 10% as a decimal?
At a fabric store a customer wants to purchase 3 ′ 3^{\prime} 3 ′ of a particular fabric that sells for $ 4.50 \$ 4.50 $4.50 per yard. How much will it cost for a 7' section?
questions.explanation: 3 ইঞ্চি ফ্রেবিক্সে খরচ হয় = 4.50 =4.50 = 4.50 টাকা 1 ⋯ n n n = 4.50 3 n 7 ⋯ n n n = 4.50 × 7 3 = 10.50  টাকা ।  \begin{array}{l} 1 \cdots \quad n \quad n \quad n=\frac{4.50}{3} n \\ 7 \cdots \quad n \quad n \quad n=\frac{4.50 \times 7}{3}=10.50 \text { টাকা । } \end{array} 1 ⋯ n n n = 3 4.50 ​ n 7 ⋯ n n n = 3 4.50 × 7 ​ = 10.50   টাকা   ।   ​

questions.question: If x + y > 5 x+y>5 x + y > 5 and x − y > 3 x-y>3 x − y > 3 , then which of the following gives all possible values of x x x and only possible values of x x x ?
questions.explanation: x + y > 5 x − y > 3 2 x > 8 ⇒ x > 4 \begin{array}{l} x+y>5 \\ x-y>3 \\ 2 x>8 \Rightarrow x>4 \end{array} x + y > 5 x − y > 3 2 x > 8 ⇒ x > 4 ​

questions.question: There are 30 socks in a drawer. 60 % 60 \% 60% of the socks are red and the rest are blue. What is the minimum number of socks that must be taken from the drawer without looking in order to be certain that at least two red socks have been chosen?
questions.explanation: 30 মোজার ৬০% লাল রং = ৩০ এর 60/100 =১৮টি মোজা লাল রংয়ের। নীল রং এর মোজা = ৩০ – ১৮ = ১২ অর্থাৎ ১৪টি মোজা আন্দাজে তুললে তার মধ্যে ১৪ – ১২ = ২টি লাল রংয়ের মোজা থাকতে পারে ।

questions.question: If a man walks H H H miles in W W W hours, and then rides R R R miles in the same length of time, what is his average rate for the entire trip?

options.label: খ
options.text: 2 ( R + H ) H W \frac{2(\mathrm{R}+\mathrm{H})}{\mathrm{HW}} HW 2 ( R + H ) ​

options.label: গ
options.text: H R − W \frac{\mathrm{H}}{\mathrm{R}-\mathrm{W}} R − W H ​

options.label: ঘ
options.text: H W + R 2   W \frac{\mathrm{HW}+\mathrm{R}}{2 \mathrm{~W}} 2   W HW + R ​

questions.option_a: R + H 2 w \frac{R+H}{2 w} 2 w R + H ​
questions.option_b: 2 ( R + H ) H W \frac{2(\mathrm{R}+\mathrm{H})}{\mathrm{HW}} HW 2 ( R + H ) ​
questions.option_c: H R − W \frac{\mathrm{H}}{\mathrm{R}-\mathrm{W}} R − W H ​
questions.option_d: H W + R 2   W \frac{\mathrm{HW}+\mathrm{R}}{2 \mathrm{~W}} 2   W HW + R ​
questions.explanation: মোট পথ অতিক্রম করে = ( R + H ) =(\mathrm{R}+\mathrm{H}) = ( R + H ) মাইল এবং সময় লাগে = 2   W =2 \mathrm{~W} = 2   W ঘণ্টা গড় বেগ = R + H 2   W =\frac{\mathrm{R}+\mathrm{H}}{2 \mathrm{~W}} = 2   W R + H ​

questions.question: Which of the following fractions is the largest?
Mr. Walker travels y miles in z hours and then w miles in x hours. How many hours will be needed to travel 750 \mathbf{7 5 0} 750 miles if he maintains this average rate?

options.label: ঘ
options.text: 750 ( x + z ) / w + y 750(\mathrm{x}+\mathrm{z}) / \mathrm{w}+\mathrm{y} 750 ( x + z ) / w + y

questions.explanation: ( w + y ) (w+y) ( w + y ) মাইল পথ যায় = ( x + z ) =(x+z) = ( x + z ) ঘন্টায় „ " n = ( x + z ) ( w + y ) " " „ = 750 ( x + z ) ( w + y )  ঘন্টায়।  \begin{array}{l} „ " n=\frac{(\mathrm{x}+\mathrm{z})}{(\mathrm{w}+\mathrm{y})} " \\ " „=\frac{750(\mathrm{x}+\mathrm{z})}{(\mathrm{w}+\mathrm{y})} \text { ঘন্টায়। } \end{array} „" n = ( w + y ) ( x + z ) ​ " "„ = ( w + y ) 750 ( x + z ) ​   ঘন্টায়।   ​

questions.question: What is the distance from point A ( 6 , 8 ) A(6,8) A ( 6 , 8 ) to point B ( − 6 , − 8 ) B(-6,-8) B ( − 6 , − 8 ) ?
The average of 4 numbers is X X X . If the average of first numbers is Y Y Y and the average of last 2 numbers is Z Z Z , wh is the second number?

options.label: ক
options.text: 4 X − Y − Z 4 X-Y-Z 4 X − Y − Z

options.label: খ
options.text: 3 Y − 2 Z 3 Y-2 Z 3 Y − 2 Z

options.label: গ
options.text: 3 Y + 2 Z − 4 X 3 \mathrm{Y}+2 \mathrm{Z}-4 \mathrm{X} 3 Y + 2 Z − 4 X

options.label: ঘ
options.text: 4 X − Y − Z 4 \mathrm{X}-\mathrm{Y}-\mathrm{Z} 4 X − Y − Z

questions.option_a: 4 X − Y − Z 4 X-Y-Z 4 X − Y − Z
questions.option_b: 3 Y − 2 Z 3 Y-2 Z 3 Y − 2 Z
questions.option_c: 3 Y + 2 Z − 4 X 3 \mathrm{Y}+2 \mathrm{Z}-4 \mathrm{X} 3 Y + 2 Z − 4 X
questions.option_d: 4 X − Y − Z 4 \mathrm{X}-\mathrm{Y}-\mathrm{Z} 4 X − Y − Z
questions.explanation: ১ম, ২য়, ৩য় ও ৪র্থ সংখ্যা যথাক্রমের o,p, q, r চারটি সংখ্যার গড় x x x হলে, o + p + q + r 4 = X \frac{o+p+q+r}{4}=X 4 o + p + q + r ​ = X ⇒ o + p + q + r = 4 X \Rightarrow o+p+q+r=4 X ⇒ o + p + q + r = 4 X ১ম তিনটি সংখ্যার গড় Y হলে = o + p + q 3 = y − ⋯ =\frac{\mathrm{o}+\mathrm{p}+\mathrm{q}}{3}=\mathrm{y}-\cdots = 3 o + p + q ​ = y − ⋯ (i) শেষ দুটি সংখ্যার গড় Z Z Z হলে = q + r 2 = z =\frac{q+r}{2}=z = 2 q + r ​ = z (i) ও (ii) যোগ করে পাই = o + p + q + q + r = 3 Y + 2 Z =o+p+q+q+r=3 Y+2 Z = o + p + q + q + r = 3 Y + 2 Z ⇒ 4 X + q = 3 Y + 2 Z ⇒ q = 3 Y + 2 Z − 4 X \Rightarrow 4 X+q=3 Y+2 Z \Rightarrow q=3 Y+2 Z-4 X ⇒ 4 X + q = 3 Y + 2 Z ⇒ q = 3 Y + 2 Z − 4 X

questions.question: If the product of 2 numbers is 20 and the sum of the two numbers is 12, then the larger of the two numbers is ———.
The price per unit of product increased by 25 % 25 \% 25% . The actual taka increase in the unit price was Tk. 1.25 . What was the unit price in Taka, before the price increase?
questions.explanation: ধরি, দাম বাড়ার আগে মূল্য ছিল x x x টাকা। ∴ x × 25 % = 1.25 ⇒ x × 25 100 = 1.25 ⇒ 25 x = 125 ⇒ x = 5 T k \begin{array}{l} \therefore \mathrm{x} \times 25 \%=1.25 \\ \Rightarrow \frac{\mathrm{x} \times 25}{100}=1.25 \Rightarrow 25 \mathrm{x}=125 \Rightarrow \mathrm{x}=5 \mathrm{Tk} \end{array} ∴ x × 25% = 1.25 ⇒ 100 x × 25 ​ = 1.25 ⇒ 25 x = 125 ⇒ x = 5 Tk ​

questions.question: A Tk 4,800 is to be divided among three people so that X X X receives twice as much as Y Y Y , who receives 1 5 \frac{1}{5} 5 1 ​ of Z Z Z . How much money should Z Z Z receives?
The sum in degrees of the interior angles of a polygon of 13 sides is:
questions.explanation: interior angle = ( n − 2 ) × 180 ∘ [ n =  number of sides  ] ∴  Total angle  = ( 13 − 2 ) × 180 ∘ = 11 × 180 ∘ = 1980 ∘ \begin{array}{l} =(\mathrm{n}-2) \times 180^{\circ}[\mathrm{n}=\text { number of sides }] \\ \begin{aligned} \therefore \text { Total angle } & =(13-2) \times 180^{\circ} \\ & =11 \times 180^{\circ}=1980^{\circ} \end{aligned} \end{array} = ( n − 2 ) × 18 0 ∘ [ n =  number of sides  ] ∴  Total angle  ​ = ( 13 − 2 ) × 18 0 ∘ = 11 × 18 0 ∘ = 198 0 ∘ ​ ​

questions.question: A 6 by 8 rectangle is inscribed in circle. What is the circumference of the circle?
What is the average (arithmetic mean) of all the multiples of ten from 5 to 185 inclusive?
questions.explanation: প্রথম সংখ্যা=  5  শেষ সংখ্যা  = 185 ∴  Average  = 5 + 185 2 = 95 \begin{array}{l} \text { প্রথম সংখ্যা= } 5 \\ \text { শেষ সংখ্যা }=185 \\ \therefore \text { Average }=\frac{5+185}{2}=95 \end{array}   প্রথম   সংখ্যা =  5   শেষ   সংখ্যা   = 185 ∴  Average  = 2 5 + 185 ​ = 95 ​

questions.question: On a street with 30 house, 10 house have fewer than 4 rooms, 14 houses have more than 5 rooms and 6 houses have more than 6 rooms. What is the total number of hoses on the street that are either 4, 5 or 6 room houses?
questions.explanation: ১০টি বাড়িতে 8 রুমের কম আছে অর্থাৎ ৪, ৫, ও ৬ রুমের মধ্যে পড়ে না। বাকী থাকল ২০টি। ১৪টি বাড়িতে ৫টির বেশি, ৬টি বাড়িতে ৬টির বেশী ক্রম আছে । ৪, ৫ ও ৬ ক্রম বিশিষ্ট বাড়ীর সংখ্যা ২০টি।

questions.question: What percent of 4 is 6 ?
questions.explanation: p × 1 100 × 4 = 6 ⇒ p 25 = 6 ⇒ p = 150 \begin{array}{l} \text { } \mathrm{p} \times \frac{1}{100} \times 4=6 \\ \Rightarrow \frac{\mathrm{p}}{25}=6 \Rightarrow \mathrm{p}=150 \end{array}   p × 100 1 ​ × 4 = 6 ⇒ 25 p ​ = 6 ⇒ p = 150 ​
